<h3 id="X31730">X(31730) = CENTER OF THE ORTHOPOLAR CIRCLE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X3 REFLECTIONS AND 1st CIRCUMPERP</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 4*a^4+(b+c)*a^3-(3*b^2+2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^2-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c)*a-(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31730) = X(1)-3*X(376) = 3*X(3)-2*X(1125) = 5*X(3)-3*X(5886) = 4*X(3)-3*X(10165) = 3*X(3)-X(12699) = 9*X(3)-5*X(18493) = X(4)-3*X(165) = 3*X(4)-5*X(1698) = 5*X(4)-7*X(7989) = 2*X(4)-3*X(10175) = 11*X(4)-17*X(30315) = 9*X(165)-5*X(1698) = 3*X(165)-2*X(6684) = 15*X(165)-7*X(7989) = 33*X(165)-17*X(30315) = 3*X(376)+X(6361) = 3*X(946)-4*X(1125) = 5*X(946)-6*X(5886) = 2*X(946)-3*X(10165) = X(946)-4*X(12512) = 3*X(946)-2*X(12699) = 9*X(946)-10*X(18493) = 10*X(1125)-9*X(5886) = 8*X(1125)-9*X(10165) = X(1125)-3*X(12512) = 6*X(1125)-5*X(18493) = 5*X(1698)-6*X(6684) = 10*X(1698)-9*X(10175) = X(5880)-3*X(11495) = 4*X(5886)-5*X(10165) = 10*X(6684)-7*X(7989) = 4*X(6684)-3*X(10175) = 22*X(6684)-17*X(30315) = 14*X(7989)-15*X(10175)</b>

<p>
X(31730) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {1, 6361}, {20, 40}, {355, 1657}, {944, 7991}, {1768, 13199}, {2096, 7994}, {2948, 12244}, {2951, 5759}, {3529, 5691}, {3654, 15681}, {3679, 11001}, {4297, 5493}, {5541, 12248}, {5690, 15704}, {5693, 9961}, {5925, 12779}, {7982, 20070}, {9860, 13172}, {9862, 13174}, {9904, 12383}, {12253, 13221}, {12408, 13200}, {12702, 18481}, {12778, 20127}, {20066, 24468}<br>
